text:

text: Your aura is beautiful because you are humble, confident and highly aware of your worth without looking down on others.

text: “She lives in dreams, alone.”

text: The pain of self disciplining yourself is better than the pain of regret .

text: She was stronger alone.

text: “Missing someone is like hearing a name sung quietly from somewhere behind you. Even after you know no one is there, you keep looking back””

text: “Alone, I often fall down into nothingness.”

author: صبر۔
text: And she’s the Queen she will beat everyone and slay!

author: صبر۔
text: We tend to use prayer as a last resort, but God wants it to be our first line of defense. We pray when there’s nothing else we can do, but God wants us to pray before we do anything at all.

author: صبر۔
text: It‘s nice when someone remembers the smallest details about you, not because you keep reminding them, but because they care.

text: There was something about him that made me want to abandon all caution.

author: صبر۔
text: Many people confuse a strong feeling of attachment to someone with having a deep connection. But when I truly have a deep connection with someone, my only hope is that my presence helps them remember they are free.

text: The formula. Full of imagination but free from fantasy, illusions and distortions.

text:

Okay.

text: “The ones who notice the storm in your eyes, the silence in your voice and the heaviness in your heart are the ones you need to let in.”

author: صبر۔
text: To have shared values is more important that share an open mind. Open mind is too random and can still remain clueless about what is true and what is not true — Values aims at the quality of things, open mind enjoys the quantity of things.

author: صبر۔
text: Every circumstance has a face but also a “soul” and a “spirit”. Slowly we learn not to judge the appearance but learn to listen to the heart of the situation — To take the situation as a guiding spiritual sign. Only if we listen deeper.

-Maulana.

author: صبر۔
text: In the end it is not what books you read, what psychic techniques you mastered how sensitive you are or how consciously you can articulate your hurt — In the end it is about the willingness to heal and the courage to love.

text: Love isn’t something you have to deserve.

text:
We need, in love, to practice only this:
letting each other go. For holding on
comes easily; we do not need to learn it.

author: صبر۔
text: Lord, an honest person who only cares about my heart, someone who never hurts me.

text: I’m honestly not mad at anyone for anything that they ever did to me. You showed me you. I needed that.

author: صبر۔
text: You are worth finding. Worth knowing. Worth loving. You and all your one million layers.
